simulations.name: Upgrade Level
simulations.assumption: Increase to the next level if not Level 3
simulations.explanation: No change – you are already at the highest level.

simulations.name: Top-up to Tier Cap
simulations.assumption: Increase balance up to cap of current tier
simulations.explanation: By adding S$23,000 to reach the Tier 3 cap of S$150,000, base interest rises from S$5.40 to S$6.36 (+S$0.96). Bonus Tier 1 remains at S$92.36, Tier 2 at S$125.41, while Tier 3 bonus increases from S$7.55 to S$94.50 (+S$86.95). Total interest rises from S$230.72 to S$318.63 (+S$87.91).

simulations.name: Upgrade Tier
simulations.assumption: Increase to the next tier if not Tier 3
simulations.explanation: No tier upgrade available – you are already at Tier 3.

recommended_action.name: Top-up to Tier Cap
steps: Transfer an additional S$23,000 into your OneCard account to raise the balance to S$150,000.
Ensure salary credit and card spend thresholds remain met to stay at Level 3.
Verify the new balance and interest benefits through the OneCard app.
